name: BallZ FallZ
description:
BallZ FallZ is an extremely exciting, fun game that challenges and trains your reaction and concentration. The farther you fall, the more points you get!

Dodge the obstacles and collect coins to unlock other balls! The farther you fall, the higher your score! Compete with the global community and put your name at the top of the leader board.

Share the game with your friends and show everyone that you are the ruler of the FallZ BallZ!

- Infinite fun
- Unlockable balls
- Leaderboard
- Optimized graphics

Send us ideas for further levels on support@wibro-games.de
Become part of a worldwide player community
